public static interface Mouse.ButtonEvent
extends Events.Position

An event dispatched when a button is pressed.

Nested Class Summary

Method Summary
 int button()
          The id of the button associated with this event, one of Mouse.BUTTON_LEFT, Mouse.BUTTON_MIDDLE, or Mouse.BUTTON_RIGHT.

Method Detail

button

int button()
The id of the button associated with this event, one of Mouse.BUTTON_LEFT, Mouse.BUTTON_MIDDLE, or Mouse.BUTTON_RIGHT.
